21  package org.opencastproject.external.endpoint;
22  
23  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.createNiceMock;
24  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.expect;
25  import static org.easymock.EasyMock.replay;
26  
27  import org.opencastproject.list.api.ListProvidersService;
28  import org.opencastproject.list.api.ResourceListQuery;
29  
30  import org.easymock.EasyMock;
31  import org.junit.Ignore;
32  
33  import java.util.ArrayList;
34  import java.util.HashMap;
35  import java.util.List;
36  import java.util.Map;
37  
38  import javax.ws.rs.Path;
39  
40  @Path("")
41  @Ignore
42  public class TestListProviderEndpoint extends ListProviderEndpoint {
43  
44    public TestListProviderEndpoint() throws Exception {
45      List<String> providers = new ArrayList<>();
46      providers.add("LANGUAGES");
47      providers.add("LICENSES");
48      providers.add("YES");
49  
50      Map<String, String> languages = new HashMap<>();
51      languages.put("ara", "LANGUAGES.ARABIC");
52      languages.put("dan", "LANGUAGES.DANISH");
53      languages.put("deu", "LANGUAGES.GERMAN");
54  
55      Map<String, String> licenses = new HashMap<>();
56      licenses.put("CC0", "{\"label\":\"EVENTS.LICENSE.CC0\", \"order\":8, \"selectable\": true}");
57      licenses.put("CC-BY-SA", "{\"label\":\"EVENTS.LICENSE.CCBYSA\", \"order\":3, \"selectable\": true}");
58      licenses.put("CC-BY-NC-ND", "{\"label\":\"EVENTS.LICENSE.CCBYNCND\", \"order\":7, \"selectable\": true}");
59  
60      ListProvidersService service = createNiceMock(ListProvidersService.class);
61      expect(service.getAvailableProviders()).andReturn(providers);
62      expect(service.getList(EasyMock.matches("LANGUAGES"), EasyMock.anyObject(ResourceListQuery.class),
63              EasyMock.anyBoolean())).andReturn(languages);
64      expect(service.getList(EasyMock.matches("LICENSES"), EasyMock.anyObject(ResourceListQuery.class),
65              EasyMock.anyBoolean())).andReturn(licenses);
66      replay(service);
67  
68      setListProvidersService(service);
69    }
70  }
